email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Voyager, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer a revised rate of $51.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.00 per metric ton. Please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and that the vessel will be ready to load on time. Also, could you send over the full charter party agreement for review? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the rate works for you. Yes, the laycan remains 15-20 October, and the vessel will be ready to load as agreed. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Thanks for your prompt responses. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the booking. Please confirm once the fixture is finalized. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Confirmed - MV Ocean Voyager
email_chain.body: Hi John, the fixture is now confirmed for the MV Ocean Voyager, loading 15-20 October, Houston to Rotterdam, at $51.00 per metric ton. Demurrage at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
